extendedInfo.description: Quality Time is designed by educators and psychologists to help kids spend quality time safely when using mobile devices. We are a team of educators and engineers of magic. We believe in Quality time, Family Tech and Creativity. Technology is evolving faster than education and smart phones are natural interfaces for kids. Kids play with devices that are not designed for them, so we created Quality Time to make it safer. All our content is safe and personally approved by our team of educators.

reviews.title: My kids love it.
reviews.comment: \"Mum can I play with your phone?\" my kids ask me all the time.   I found this App is a safe way to ensure that the videos kids watch are age-appropriate and do not have in-app purchases or adult adds. Kids navigate easily and love the books and the stories.   Yesterday my son used the App and leaned how to perform a magic trick, and later he showed it to his grandmother. I was very happy that he had learned something new, he was so happy.   I would recommend it to anyone with kids.
reviews.author: Meri Rosich
